Tolkien-related events that took place in 2017.

content.title: January
content.content:
3 - Birthday Toast.
27 - Actor John Hurt dies.
30 - Actor Victor Platt dies.
? - Amon Hen 263 is published.
? - Mallorn 57 is published.

content.title: February
content.content: 2 - The Hobbit Movie Trilogy Colouring Book is published.

content.title: March
content.content:
14 - Bodleian Library announce the book Tolkien: The Maker of Middle-earth to go alongside their forthcoming exhibition.
25 - Tolkien Reading Day. The Tolkien Society hosts a storytelling of Mr. Bliss at The Story Museum, Oxford.
28 - John Ronald's Dragons: The Story of J.R.R. Tolkien is published.
? - Amon Hen 264 is published.

content.title: July
content.content:
2 - The Tolkien Society Seminar at the Hilton, Leeds.
3 - A lawsuit was settled between Warner Bros. and Tolkien Estate.
14 - J.R.R. Tolkien the Esperantist: Before the Arrival of Bilbo Baggins is published.
21 - J.R.R. Tolkien: Romanticist and Poet is published.
31 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Mordor is released online.
? - Amon Hen 266 is published.

content.title: August
content.content:
10-13 - Omentielva Otsea - the Seventh International Conference on Tolkien's Invented Languages at California State University, East Bay.
31 - Tolkien Calendar 2018 is published.
? - Christopher Tolkien resigns from his appointment as director of the Tolkien Estate.

content.title: September
content.content:
15 - The revised edition of Aragorn: J.R.R. Tolkien's Undervalued Hero is published.
21 - The deluxe boxed set edition of The History of Middle-earth is published.
21 - 24 - Oxonmoot 2017 at St Antony's College.
30 - J.R.R. Tolkien: Romanticist and Poet is published.
? - Amon Hen 267 is published.

content.title: October
content.content:
8 - Binding Them All is published.
9 - Filming began on Tolkien (film), directed by Dome Karukoski and written by David Gleeson.
10 - Middle-earth: Shadow of War is released.
12 - Flora of Middle-Earth: Plants of J.R.R. Tolkien's Legendarium is published.
19 - Middle-earth: From Script to Screen: Building the World of The Lord of the Rings and The Hobbit is published.
19 - The Middle-earth Treasury is published.
24 - Faith Faulconbridge dies.
26 - Roger Garland dies.

content.title: November
content.content:
2 - The second edition of The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide is published.
13 - Amazon acquires the global television rights for the books The Lord of the Rings and The Hobbit from Tolkien Estate.
30 - The Sweet and the Bitter: Death and Dying in J. R. R. Tolkien's the Lord of the Rings is published.
? - Amon Hen 268 is published.
? - Mallorn 58 is published.

content.title: December
content.content:
1 - Death and Immortality in Middle-earth is published.
17 - "There Would Always Be a Fairy Tale": Essays on Tolkien's Middle-earth is published.
22 - The Inklings and King Arthur is published
? - The Flame Imperishable: Tolkien, St. Thomas, and the Metaphysics of Faerie is published.
